handNote.p: Main scribe of the manuscript. Rotund hand. e varies between round and horned, so does c. The main hand has a quirk in which ascenders of long, tall letters, especially þ, tend to wobble slightly, curving a bit left at the top and curving to the right at the bottom. Here lightning-bolt abbreviatory signs dominate, perhaps entirely, over straight signs. Some revisions.
